subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Woods, who has not competed in almost two months, had a tranquil tone as he said he would play in the par-3 contest, apparently so his children can be his caddies.
snippet: Woods, who has not competed in almost two months, had a tranquil tone as he said he would play in the par-3 contest, apparently so his children can be his caddies.
